credit_line: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
title: Belted Tobacco Pouch
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
description: Rectangular, with curved sides featuring raised, trompe l'oeil decoration simulating a soft, textured, belted, tobacco pouch, folded over with flap at front, as well as match and one dime tucked into belt; reverse decoration simulates pinched belt loop with belt running through it; remnant of red color on match tip. Upper part of pouch or lid hinged on left side. Striker on bottom.
name: Matchsafe
